page.title: 02CHRISTIE'S WITHINGTON
page.content: Christie hospital specialises in all aspects of cancer treatment and it is a pioneering research institute in this field.It is situated in Withington,Manchester.It was opened in 1932 and it is now one of the biggest cancer units in Europe.It can boast of curing about half its patients.It has a very large staff including consultant clinicians,research workers,secretaries and porters etc. Its research work is mainly funded by charity and the NHS.Diagnosis is made by means of blood tests,tissue analysis and radiology,while possible treatments include drugs,radiation and surgery.The hospital uses several new techniques,including ultra_sound and obtaining pictures by using nuclear magnetic resonance.
